lead_paragraph: DUKE--Robin Chandler. The trustees and staff of the Solomon R. Guggenheim Foundation and Museum note with sadness the passing of friend and former trustee Robin Chandler Duke, a member of our board from 1980-93. A United States ambassador and champion for the rights of women worldwide, Mrs. Duke represented the best of humanitarianism and public service. We extend our deepest condolences to her family. Honorary Chairman, Peter Lawson-Johnston Chairman, William L. Mack President, Jennifer Blei Stockman Director, Richard Armstrong 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  DUKE, ROBIN CHANDLER
